thread.section_title: Matboard and More Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Matboard and More | matboardandmore.com
thread.title: Happy in KS
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Happy in KS

author: Happy in KS
title: Happy in KS
text:
My experience was excellent. The pricing was reasonable, the shipping was quick, and the product was exactly what I wanted. It took me some time to figure out the plexiglass (wrapped in protective paper) was included on my products, perhaps Matboard could flag it with a label- I almost threw it away!
I will be returning to Matboard for future needs, thanks!
